00050 /***************************************************************************/
00053 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT          1
00054 //There are no any commands at the server side
00055 
00056 /***************************************************************************/
00059 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT        1
00060 //There are no any attributes at the client side
00061 
00062 /***************************************************************************/
00065 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT          0
00066 //There are no any commands at the client side
00067 
00068 //Attribute Ids of Basic Cluster Information
00069 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                          CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00070 
00071 //Atribute Ids of Basic Device Information Attribute Set at the server side
00073 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_ZCL_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID               CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00074 
00075 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_APPLICATION_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID       CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0001)
00076 
00077 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_STACK_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID             CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0002)
00078 
00079 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_HW_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0003)
00080 
00081 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_MANUFACTURER_NAME_ATTRIBUTE_ID         CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0004)
00082 
00083 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_MODEL_IDENTIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_ID          CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0005)
00084 
00085 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_DATE_CODE_ATTRIBUTE_ID                 CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0006)
00086

00209 #define ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER(clattributes, clcommands)                                                \
00210   {                                                                                                              \
00211     .id = BASIC_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                                      \
00212     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},                  \
00213     .attributesAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                              \
00214     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                      \
00215     .commandsAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                  \
00216     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands                                                                            \
00217   }
00218 
00219 #define ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_FLASH(clattributes) ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER(clattributes)
00220 /***************************************************************************/
00235 #define ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT(clattributes)                                                                        \
00236   {                                                                                                              \
00237     .id = BASIC_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                                      \
00238     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},                  \
00239     .attributesAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                              \
00240     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                                          \
00241     .commandsAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                  \
00242     .commands = NULL                                                                                             \
00243   }

00251 typedef struct PACK
00252 {
00253   struct PACK
00254   {
00255     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00256     uint8_t             type;         
00257     uint8_t             properties;   
00258     uint16_t            value;        
00259   } clusterVersion;
00260   
00262 
00268   struct PACK
00269   {
00270     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00271     uint8_t             type;         
00272     uint8_t             properties;   
00273     uint8_t             value;        
00274   } zclVersion;
00275 
00278   struct PACK
00279   {
00280     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00281     uint8_t             type;         
00282     uint8_t             properties;   
00283     uint8_t             value;        
00284   } applicationVersion;
00285 
00288   struct PACK
00289   {
00290     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00291     uint8_t             type;         
00292     uint8_t             properties;   
00293     uint8_t             value;        
00294   } stackVersion;
00295 
00298   struct PACK
00299   {
00300     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00301     uint8_t             type;         
00302     uint8_t             properties;   
00303     uint8_t             value;        
00304   } hwVersion;
00305 
00308   struct PACK
00309   {
00310     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00311     uint8_t             type;         
00312     uint8_t             properties;   
00313     uint8_t             value[32];     
00314   } manufacturerName;
00315 
00318   struct PACK
00319   {
00320     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00321     uint8_t             type;         
00322     uint8_t             properties;   
00323     uint8_t             value[32];     
00324   } modelIdentifier;
00325 
00326   struct PACK
00327   {
00328     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00329     uint8_t type;
00330     uint8_t properties;
00331     uint8_t value[16];
00332   } dateCode;
00333   
00353   struct PACK
00354   {
00355     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00356     uint8_t             type;         
00357     uint8_t             properties;   
00358     uint8_t             value;        
00359   } powerSource;
00360 
00365   struct PACK
00366   {
00367     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;

00369     uint8_t             properties;   
00370     uint8_t             value;        
00371   } physicalEnvironment;
00372

00417 typedef struct PACK

00438 // The ResetToFactoryDefaults command is optional now.
00439 /***************************************************************************/
00449 typedef struct PACK
00450 {
00451   struct
00452   {
00453     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00454     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00455 
00460     ZCL_Status_t(*resetToFactoryDefaultsCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00461   } resetToFactoryDefaults;
00462 } ZCL_BasicClusterServerCommands_t;
